content: knitwear designs 2014 decrease round k2tog entire round 8 sts all rights reserved for pattern support please contact me knit 4 row of color a through ravelry at florandfauna or at knit 3 row of color b fandfknitwear@gmail com thank you decrease round k2tog entire round 4 sts please visit our website at begin 2 color i-cord www florandfauna wix com/florandfauna arrange remaining 4 sts on one side of cable needle or on a double point working yarn will be all the way to left of needle work 4 sts in color a bringing it around over color b which should be laying flora and fauna is pleased to announce closest to needle that will ensure the a partnership with great lakes yarn co color not being worked is carried up the visit their website at inside of i-cord do this every row www greatlakesyarnco com to see all do not turn work the colorways and yarn weights slide sts to opposite end of needle and knit the 4 sts again in color a working yarn will always start at far left end repeat 2 more times switch to color b bringing it around color a to carry color a up the inside of i-cord work 4 row continue to switch colors very 4 row until desired length is reached sample was done doing a white section followed by a red section 3 times the length of the hat is approx 17 inches tuck ends and securely sew a pom pom or tassel to tip of hat happy knitting cindy
